docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 5 (UPI) -- Women's place is less in the home and more on the job, Miss Bertha S. Adkins declared today.

headline.main: WORKING WOMEN SEEN INCREASING; Miss Adkins Says Husbands Are Proud of Them and Take Over Home Chores

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 5 (UPI) -- Women's place is less in the home and more on the job, Miss Bertha S. Adkins declared today.
